newsitem.title: UK: Waste Management sells Inusa stake.
newsitem.headline: Waste Management sells Inusa stake.

text.p: Waste Management International Plc said on Thursday it haD sold its 60 percent stake in Ingenieria Urbana (Inusa) to a unit of Spain's Compania Espanola de Servicios Publico Auxiliares (CESPA)for 9.9 million stg in cash.
The British waste disposal and recycling group said Inusa provides solid waste collection and recycling mainly in southeastern Spain.
Segema Servicios Generales de Medio Ambiente, the unit of CESPA, bought 40 percent of Inusa from Spain's Corporacion Bancaria de Espana SA (Argentaria) on June 23.
